name: Orbflux: Fire
text:
{1}, Discard Orbflux: Fire: Meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you donâ€™t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target spell you control with mana value equal or less to the number of Orb counters on this.
